name: Pec Dec
steps: 1. Sit on the machine with your back flat on the pad, and take hold of the handles with your arms parallel to the floor.
2. Push the handles together slowly and squeeze your chest muscles. Breathe out during this motion.
3. Return to the starting position as you breathe in. Repeat for the number of desired repetitions.

name: Reverse Pec Dec
steps: 1. Adjust the handles so that they are fully to the rear and grab them with your hands facing inwards.
2. Pull your arms out to the side and back and contract your rear shoulders.
3. Return to the starting position. Repeat for the numbaer of desired repetitions.

name: Standing Calf Raises
steps: 1. Place the balls of your feet on the platform with your heels extending out. Ensure that your knees are straight.
2. Extend your ankles as high as possible. Ensure that your knees are not bending and you are fully using your calves.
3. Lower your heels a little past below the platform and bend your ankles until calves are stretched.
4. Repeat for the number of desired repetitions.

name: Tricep Pushdowns
steps: 1. Place the back of your arms/elbow flat on the pad and your hands on the hand rest.
2. Lower your triceps all the way until your arms are reaching straight towards the ground. Ensure that your shoulders are stationary during the motion.
3. Return to the strating position. Repeat for the number of desired repetitions.

name: Lat Pulldowns
steps: 1. Adjust the seat and knee pads to your height. Grab the handles in a desired grip.
2. Lean back slightly and make a small curvature around your lower back while sticking your chest out. This is your starting position.
3. While breahting out, bring the bar down until it reaches your chest. Concentrate on contracting your back muscles during this motion.
4. Raise the bar back to the starting position. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Bicep Curls
steps: 1. Place your elbows flat on the pad and grip the handle.
2. Keeping your shoulders and upper arm stationary, curl the handle up fully towards your shoulders.
3. Slowly lower the bar back to the starting position making sure that your arms are straight at the bottom of the movement.
4. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Bicep Machine
steps: 1. Place your elbows flat against the pads and grip the handles.
2. Keeping your shoulders and upper arm stationary, curl the handle up fully towards your shoulders.
3. Slowly lower the handles back to the starting position making sure that your arms are straight at the bottom of the movement.
4. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Vertical Rows
steps: 1. Place your chest flat against the pad and straighten your back.
2. Slowly pull the handles back, while concentrating on contracting your back muscles.
3. Return to the starting position. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Seated Rows
steps: 1. Place your feet flat against the feetpad and straighten your back.
2. Slowly pull the handles back, while concentrating on contracting your back muscles.
3. Return to the starting position. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Assisted Pull Ups
steps: 1. Select the amount of 'helping' weight you desire for the exercise.
2. Climb up the steps carefully and grasp the pull up bar handles.
3. Place your feet on the weight platform and lower your body all the way down. This will be your starting position.
4. While exhaling, pull your torso up until the bar touches your chest. Concentrate on flexing your back muscles as you do so.
5. Lower your body and return to the staring position as you inhale. Repeat for the number of desired repetitions.
6. When the exercise is fully completed, carefully step onto the steps and step off from the machine.

text: 7. If you would like to perform the exercise without assistance, place a counterweight to lower the feet platform to the ground.

name: Assisted Dips
steps: 1. Select the amount of 'helping' weight you desire for the exercise.
2. Climb up the steps carefully and grab the dip handles to your sides.
3. Place your feet on the weight platform and hold your body at arm's length with your arms nearly locked above the handles.
4. Inhale and slowly lower yourself downward. Ensure that your torso stays upright and elbows close to your body.
5. Lower yourself until there is a 90 degree angle formed at your elbow.
6. Return to the starting position as you exhale. Repeat for the number of desired repetitions.
7. When the exercise is fully completed, carefully step onto the steps and step off from the machine.

text: 8. If you would like to perform the exercise without assistance, place a counterweight to lower the feet platform to the ground.

name: Leg Press
steps: 1. Plant your feet a little wider than shoulder width on the platform. Grasp the handles with your chest up and your head looking forward.
2. Push the platform driving through the heels of your feet. Do not lock your knees, especially when doing heaver weight.
3. Return to the starting position without fully returning the weight to the stack. Repeat for the desired number of repetions.

name: Leg Extensions
steps: 1. Adjust the kneepad so that your lower and upper legs form a 90 degree angle.
2. Extend your legs to the maximum using your quadriceps and ensure that your body remains stationary.
3. Slowly lower the weight back to the starting position. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Lying Leg Curls
steps: 1. Lying flat on the bench, fully stretch your legs and grasph the handles on the sides.
2. While exhaling, curl your legs up as far as possible towards your thighs without lifting the upper legs from the pad.
3. Lower your legs back to the starting position. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Seated Leg Curls
steps: 1. Fully stretch your legs out and place them on the leg rest and secure the lap pads against your thighs.
2. Lower your legs as far back as possible to your thighs. Concentrate on the feel of your hamstrings contracting.
3. Raise your legs back to the starting position. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Chest Press
steps: 1. Grab the handles with your back flat against the seat and your chest up.
2. Push the handles away from your body as you exhale.
3. Return to the starting position as you inhale. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Lateral Raises
steps: 1. Places the bases of your upper arms agaist the pads and grasp the handles.
2. Move your upper arms laterally away from your body until your they are parallel to the floor.
3. Return to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Rotary Torso
steps: 1. IMPORTANT: Only perform this exercise one side at a time.
2. Grasp the handles with the inner crook of your arms around the pads.
3. Tilt your body to the desired side slightly until you feel the weight being lifted slightly as well.
4. Turn your torso all the way around as much as your flexibility allows. Ensure that your hips are stationary
5. Return to the starting position making sure not to drop the weight. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Rotary Shoulder
steps: 1. Grasp the handles as you keep the elbows bent and in line with your torso.
2. Lift the handles and the weight as you exhale. Make sure to extend the arms fully.
3. Lower the handles slowly back to the starting position as you inhale. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Shoulder Press
steps: 1. Grasp the handles as you keep the elbows bent and in line with your torso
2. Lift the handles and the weight as you exhale. Make sure to extend the arms fully.
3. Lower the handles slowly back to the starting position as you inhale. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Ab Cruncher
steps: 1. Place your feet under the platform below and grasp the handles
2. As you breathe out, crunch your upper torso and feel your abdominal muscles contracting.
3. Slowly return to the starting position as you breathe in. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
